Article 91
After the payment of income taxes by the Joint Venture Company, the Board of
Directors will determine the annual allocations to each of the Three Funds from
the after-tax net profits. The sum
                                    Page 21
of the allocations to the Three Funds for any fiscal year shall be determined by
the Board and shall not exceed ten percent (10%) of the after-tax profit for
that year so as to ensure the Joint Venture Company's smooth operation.
perturbation.changed_text:
Article 91
After the payment of income taxes by the Joint Venture Company, the Board of
Directors will determine the annual allocations to each of the Three Funds from
the after-tax net profits. The sum
                                    Page 21
of the allocations to the Three Funds for any fiscal year shall be determined by
the CEO and shall not exceed twenty percent (20%) of the after-tax profit for
that year so as to maximize employee benefits.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict by stating that the CEO determines the allocation to the Three Funds and that the allocations can not exceed 20% of the profits, whereas the original text states it's the board that determines the allocation, and it shall not exceed 10%. This creates uncertainty regarding who is responsible for the allocations and what the maximum percentage should be.

directors:

perturbation.original_text:
Article 78
Expatriate management personnel and Chinese management personnel in the same
position shall receive equivalent salary and benefits.
perturbation.changed_text:
Article 78
Expatriate management personnel shall receive higher salary and benefits than Chinese management personnel even in the same position to attract top talent.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a conflict by stating that expatriate management personnel receive higher salary and benefits than Chinese management personnel, contradicting the initial statement that they receive equivalent compensation in the same position. This creates a potential legal issue related to equal pay and discrimination.
